title: 视频去闪烁AE/PR插件 Flicker Free v1.1.8 Mac版
author: 大众脸
content:
由于我们肉眼和摄像机捕捉的光线频率不一样，所以我们有时候用摄像机捕捉的视频会出现光闪烁的现象，Digital Anarchy Flicker Free 插件能帮助我们弥补这一缺陷，能够很好的处理光闪烁、延时拍摄闪烁、动态闪烁等问题。解决做延时摄影或拍摄慢动作（高帧速率）视频产生的闪光，同时也能有效去除LED灯、电脑显示器或电气干扰时产生的闪烁。插件通过分析画面的颜色和亮度计算匹配出平滑的视频图像，支持4K。

Flicker Free is a powerful new way to deflicker video. It solves an issue common for many types of footage, be it from lights/electricity and cameras being out of sync, time lapse or slow motion (high frame rate) video. It’s very effective at removing rolling flicker from LED & fluorescent lights or computer monitors.

Flicker Free was originally designed to fix flicker caused by varying exposures in time lapse videography. However, we discovered it handles most flicker types well. HOME – http://digitalanarchy.com/Flicker/main.html
supported_os: Mac系统（兼容Big Sur，不支持M1芯片电脑）
